subject: Golf
Federal District Courts
Taxation
lead_paragraph: Jim Thorpe, a Champions Tour veteran, has been charged with failing to pay $1.6 million in federal taxes. The charges filed in federal court in Orlando, Fla., accuse Thorpe of failing to pay taxes on income he earned in 2002, 2003 and 2004. Thorpe’s lawyer said his client did not violate the law willfully and planned to plead not guilty. ¶The L.P.G.A. Tour has signed a 10-year agreement with the Golf Channel, making the network the exclusive cable home for the tour beginning in 2010. The agreement establishes the tour as the only stand-alone United States women’s professional sports organization to receive a rights fee agreement for domestic broadcast coverage. lpga (AP).
